body.para: A course exists for a year. Courses for a new year must be created prior to the commencement of enrolment for that year.
Bring Forward Courses reduces your workload by automatically copying courses from the current year into the next. It is therefore a first step in preparing for the new year.
However, before using this procedure, you should ensure enrolment terms for the new year have been created.

Select the courses to be copied by ticking the check box on the left side of the grid. Hint: Use the check box in the header to select/un-select all. Then, click the Create Courses button to create the selected courses in the new year.
This procedure may be executed as many times as required. Duplicate course records will not be created.
Once copied, courses for the new year may need to be edited. Please ensure you have selected the correct year before editing. Refer to Add/Edit Courses.
